name: FATMAX Tape Measure
description: FATMAX is engineered to fit comfortably in the palm of your hand and equipped with our patented Twin-Core™ technology for a compact case design.

name: Brushless Cordless 5-in-1 Drill Kit
description: Take on a wide range of drilling jobs with the incredible versatility offered by the XTREME™ 12V MAX* Brushless Cordless 5-in-1 Drill/Driver Kit.

name: Cutting Blade Size: 10 Inch, 1600W
description: This Saw Blades are ideal for any wood-cutting application. The ripping blades, is engineered to deliver straight,cuts over the life of the blade.

name: 3 lb Fiberglass Drilling Hammer
description: This hammer offers a concentrated strike face for superior impact.This sledge hammer is built tough to withstand those outdoor, rugged conditions.

name: 380mm x 11TPI Blade Armour Saw
description: This FATMAX 15 saw is designed for sharp cuts. It has triple jet cut teeth and a BladeArmor coated blade for fast cutting to reduce friction.

name: 30 pc Ratcheting Screwdriver Set
description: Complete a variety of fastening jobs quickly and easily with this Multi-Bit Ratcheting Screwdriver Set.

name: Folding Hand Truck
description: Transport stock and heavy loads with the Folding Hand Truck. This adaptable utility cart folds and opens quickly to minimize the time.

name: Retractable Utility Knife
description: Retractable Utility Knife features an optimized shape. The nose of the knife features an exposed blade step to speed up blade placement.

name: 4-3/8 in Jaw Capacity Quick Vise
description: Jaw Capacity Quick Vise is ideal for DIY and hobbyist projects.The quick vise utilizes a slide for quick, easy positioning and a lever for tightening.
